sentence: SEC Comment: In the section entitled Value Investing defined-A long-term view in the Prospectus, the second sentence of the third paragraph states that: The Funds believe a stock is fully valued when it is trading at a price-to-earnings ratio of more than 20 times forward 12 month earnings and/or it is no longer trading at a discount to our private market value calculation.
